name: amahowsmarthome
0:
”Alexa, turn on the baby light”
”Alexa, turn off the baby light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Amahow® is a our smart home brand ! (amahow.com)
As below setup steps
1. Need Amazon Account linking
2. Use Apower app and smardo's smart plug or smart power strip
 (1) IOS: https://itunes.apple.com/tw/app/apower-spm285/id953100836?mt=8
 (2) Google: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.aione.spm285.apower
3. Use Apower app to configure Amazon accounts associated with smardo app accounts
4. Alexa, turn on the baby light 
5. Alexa, turn off the baby light 

more updating , please refer our website:
http://amahow.com
